objectives: Use everyday small-talk phrases (HOW-ARE-YOU?, LONG-TIME-NO-SEE, WHAT‚ÄôS-UP?)

vocab.def: Hands move outward from chest; polite greeting.
Index circles outward near eye; extended absence.
Middle fingers brush chest upward; casual greeting.
B-hand shakes in front of non-dominant palm.
SAME: Y-hands move together; DIFFERENT: index fingers cross/diverge.
Friendly face, slight nod, brows neutral.
